H0.text: In March 2000 a plaque was unveiled at Southport College of Art.It commemorated the contribution of three former students who collaborated in the founding of a comic in the town 50 years earlier. Which comic. Beano

H1.text: In March 2000 a plaque was unveiled at Southport College of Art.It commemorated the contribution of three former students who collaborated in the founding of a comic in the town 50 years earlier. Which comic. Dandy

H2.text: In March 2000 a plaque was unveiled at Southport College of Art.It commemorated the contribution of three former students who collaborated in the founding of a comic in the town 50 years earlier. Which comic. Buster

H3.text: In March 2000 a plaque was unveiled at Southport College of Art.It commemorated the contribution of three former students who collaborated in the founding of a comic in the town 50 years earlier. Which comic. EAGLE

A4.text: the new comic, which by then, inspired by the design of her church lectern, had been christened Eagle by Hampson's wife.

A5.text: the comic was created in a converted bakery in the Churchtown district of Southport.
